original_title: Jill-Michele Meleán: Guys Have It Easy
overview: Jill-Michele Melean: Guys Have It Easy is the remarkable comic's debut stand-up special and proves why this actress/comedian has such a tremendous fan following. With her unique brand of Mars vs. Venus comparisons of men and women Jill-Michele covers topics such as Bathroom Etiquette, Alcohol Consumption, Blended Families & Tramp Stamp Tattoos. From start to finish this MadTV alum keeps her audience in stitches.
title: Jill-Michele Meleán: Guys Have It Easy
